conversations.content: Load the infrastructure workspace

tool_call: memoryManager_loadWorkspace
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732187200000_u3v4w5x6y", "workspaceId": "ws_1732187200000_z7a8b9c0d", "sessionDescription": "Loading workspace", "sessionMemory": "Switching to infrastructure workspace", "toolContext": "Loading workspace", "primaryGoal": "Work on infrastructure", "subgoal": "Load workspace"}, "id": "ws_1732100000000_infra789"}
Move the schema file to the types directory

tool_call: vaultManager_moveNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732190800000_e9f0g1h2i", "workspaceId": "ws_1732190800000_j3k4l5m6n", "sessionDescription": "Moving schema", "sessionMemory": "Reorganizing type definitions", "toolContext": "Moving file", "primaryGoal": "Organize types", "subgoal": "Move schema file"}, "path": "/src/schema.ts", "newPath": "/src/types/schema.ts"}
Search for all GraphQL queries

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732194400000_o5p6q7r8s", "workspaceId": "ws_1732194400000_t9u0v1w2x", "sessionDescription": "Finding GraphQL queries", "sessionMemory": "Searching for query definitions", "toolContext": "Searching content", "primaryGoal": "Review queries", "subgoal": "Find GraphQL queries"}, "query": "query", "paths": ["/src/graphql"], "limit": 40}
Delete the prototype agent

tool_call: agentManager_deleteAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732198000000_y1z2a3b4c", "workspaceId": "ws_1732198000000_d5e6f7g8h", "sessionDescription": "Deleting prototype", "sessionMemory": "Removing prototype agent", "toolContext": "Deleting agent", "primaryGoal": "Clean agents", "subgoal": "Delete prototype"}, "id": "agent_1732100000000_prototype"}
Load the performance tuning workspace

tool_call: memoryManager_loadWorkspace
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732201600000_i7j8k9l0m", "workspaceId": "ws_1732201600000_n1o2p3q4r", "sessionDescription": "Loading performance workspace", "sessionMemory": "Switching to performance work", "toolContext": "Loading workspace", "primaryGoal": "Optimize performance", "subgoal": "Load workspace"}, "id": "ws_1732100000000_perf"}
Find all API route definitions

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732205200000_s3t4u5v6w", "workspaceId": "ws_1732205200000_x7y8z9a0b", "sessionDescription": "Finding routes", "sessionMemory": "Searching for API routes", "toolContext": "Searching content", "primaryGoal": "Review routes", "subgoal": "Find definitions"}, "query": "router", "paths": ["/src/routes"], "limit": 65}
List all shell scripts

tool_call: vaultManager_listDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732208800000_c9d0e1f2g", "workspaceId": "ws_1732208800000_h3i4j5k6l", "sessionDescription": "Listing shell scripts", "sessionMemory": "Viewing automation scripts", "toolContext": "Listing directory", "primaryGoal": "Review scripts", "subgoal": "List shell files"}, "path": "/scripts", "filter": "*.sh", "includeFiles": true}
Execute a database optimization analysis

tool_call: agentManager_executePrompt
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732212400000_m5n6o7p8q", "workspaceId": "ws_1732212400000_r9s0t1u2v", "sessionDescription": "Optimizing database", "sessionMemory": "Running database analysis", "toolContext": "Executing prompt", "primaryGoal": "Optimize DB", "subgoal": "Run analysis"}, "prompt": "Analyze database performance and suggest optimization strategies"}
Load the maintenance session

tool_call: memoryManager_loadSession
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732216000000_w1x2y3z4a", "workspaceId": "ws_1732216000000_b5c6d7e8f", "sessionDescription": "Loading maintenance", "sessionMemory": "Resuming maintenance tasks", "toolContext": "Loading session", "primaryGoal": "Perform maintenance", "subgoal": "Load session"}, "sessionId": "session_1732100000000_maintenance"}
Update the SSL certificate path in nginx config

tool_call: contentManager_replaceContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732219600000_g7h8i9j0k", "workspaceId": "ws_1732219600000_l1m2n3o4p", "sessionDescription": "Updating SSL path", "sessionMemory": "Changing certificate location", "toolContext": "Replacing content", "primaryGoal": "Update SSL", "subgoal": "Replace path"}, "filePath": "/config/nginx.conf", "oldContent": "ssl_certificate /etc/ssl/old-cert.pem", "newContent": "ssl_certificate /etc/ssl/certs/new-cert.pem"}
Create a progress bar component from status bar

tool_call: vaultManager_duplicateNote
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732223200000_q3r4s5t6u", "workspaceId": "ws_1732223200000_v7w8x9y0z", "sessionDescription": "Creating progress bar", "sessionMemory": "Duplicating status bar as progress", "toolContext": "Duplicating note", "primaryGoal": "Build progress bars", "subgoal": "Create component"}, "sourcePath": "/components/StatusBar.tsx", "targetPath": "/components/ProgressBar.tsx"}
Set up a token refresh agent for API authentication

tool_call: agentManager_createAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732226800000_a9b0c1d2e", "workspaceId": "ws_1732226800000_f3g4h5i6j", "sessionDescription": "Setting up API token management", "sessionMemory": "User needs automated token refresh for API calls", "toolContext": "Creating token refresh agent", "primaryGoal": "Automate API authentication", "subgoal": "Create refresh agent"}, "name": "Token Refresh Manager", "description": "Handles automatic token refresh and renewal for API authentication", "prompt": "You are a token management assistant. Monitor token expiration and refresh tokens automatically."}
Toggle the backup scheduler agent

tool_call: agentManager_toggleAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732228600000_k6l7m8n9o", "workspaceId": "ws_1732228600000_p0q1r2s3t", "sessionDescription": "Managing backup agent", "sessionMemory": "Toggling backup scheduler status", "toolContext": "Toggle agent", "primaryGoal": "Manage backups", "subgoal": "Toggle scheduler"}, "id": "agent_backup_scheduler_001"}
Add production-ready tag to the deployment state

tool_call: memoryManager_updateState
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732230400000_u2v3w4x5y", "workspaceId": "ws_1732230400000_z6a7b8c9d", "sessionDescription": "Tagging state", "sessionMemory": "Marking deployment state as production-ready", "toolContext": "Update state", "primaryGoal": "Tag states", "subgoal": "Add tag"}, "stateId": "state_deploy_001", "addTags": ["production-ready"], "context": {"sessionId": "session_1732230400000_u2v3w4x5y", "workspaceId": "ws_1732230400000_z6a7b8c9d", "sessionDescription": "Tagging state", "sessionMemory": "Marking deployment state as production-ready", "toolContext": "Update state", "primaryGoal": "Tag states", "subgoal": "Add tag"}}
Append the deployment checklist to the runbook

tool_call: contentManager_appendContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732232200000_e8f9g0h1i", "workspaceId": "ws_1732232200000_j2k3l4m5n", "sessionDescription": "Updating runbook", "sessionMemory": "Adding deployment checklist to operations runbook", "toolContext": "Append checklist", "primaryGoal": "Improve runbook", "subgoal": "Add checklist"}, "filePath": "Operations/Runbook.md", "content": "

## Deployment Checklist

- [ ] Run all tests
- [ ] Build production bundle
- [ ] Backup database
- [ ] Deploy to staging
- [ ] Smoke test staging
- [ ] Deploy to production
- [ ] Monitor for errors"}
Enable the translation agent for i18n support

tool_call: agentManager_updateAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732234000000_o4p5q6r7s", "workspaceId": "ws_1732234000000_t8u9v0w1x", "sessionDescription": "Enabling translations", "sessionMemory": "Turning on internationalization support", "toolContext": "Enable i18n", "primaryGoal": "Enable translations", "subgoal": "Update agent"}, "id": "agent_i18n_001", "isEnabled": true}
Write a performance tuning guide

tool_call: contentManager_createContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732235800000_y0z1a2b3c", "workspaceId": "ws_1732235800000_d4e5f6g7h", "sessionDescription": "Writing performance guide", "sessionMemory": "Creating performance optimization documentation", "toolContext": "Create guide", "primaryGoal": "Document performance", "subgoal": "Write guide"}, "filePath": "Docs/Performance-Tuning.md", "content": "# Performance Tuning Guide

## Database Optimization
- Add indexes on frequently queried columns
- Use connection pooling
- Implement query caching

## Application Performance
- Enable gzip compression
- Use CDN for static assets
- Implement lazy loading

## Monitoring
- Track response times
- Monitor memory usage
- Set up alerts"}
Create an agent called CodeReviewer to help me review pull requests.

tool_call: agentManager_createAgent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731435200000_x1y2z3a4b", "workspaceId": "ws_1731435200000_c5d6e7f8g", "sessionDescription": "Creating code review agent", "sessionMemory": "User wants automated PR review assistance", "toolContext": "Set up new CodeReviewer agent", "primaryGoal": "Create code review agent", "subgoal": "Initialize CodeReviewer"}, "name": "CodeReviewer", "description": "Expert code reviewer for pull requests", "prompt": "You are an expert code reviewer. Analyze code for bugs, performance issues, and best practices. Provide constructive feedback.", "model": "claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022", "enabled": true}
Search for all markdown files in my Learning path.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731448400000_p5q6r7s8t", "workspaceId": "ws_1731448400000_u9v0w1x2y", "sessionDescription": "Listing learning materials", "sessionMemory": "User reviewing learning resources", "toolContext": "Search Learning directory", "primaryGoal": "Inventory learning notes", "subgoal": "Find markdown files"}, "query": "*.md", "paths": ["Learning"], "searchType": "files", "fileTypes": ["md"], "limit": 40}
Create a new folder called Archive.
Delete agent agent_103.
Run multiple searches across the vault.
Move Resources/Temp to Archive/Resources.
Show me the details for agent agent_203.
In readme.md, replace 'Version 1.0' with 'Version 2.0'.
Open sprint-retrospective.md.
Optimize this algorithm using Optimizer.
Clear draft-notes.md.
Move checklist.md to Workflows/checklist.md.
Find directories with 'assets' in Resources.
